location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Section of Admiralty chart showing channels to Dhulaifain and Ras Tanura

mods.abstract: The map accompanies a letter (folios 47-50) from Hamilton R Ballantyne, Ballantyne and Company, representing the California Arabian Standard Oil Company Limited (CASOC), to the India Office, dated 8 July 1938.The map shows (marked in red crayon) the channels to the company's two proposed anchorages in Saudi Arabia: Dhulaifain and Ras Tanura [Ra’s Tannūrah]. The company desired the assistance of the British Government in laying and maintaining buoys in the channels.The letter states that the map was taken from a published Admiralty chart, described as Persian Gulf Western Sheet, no. 2837B.
